Cost Engineer Job at Hobark International Limited




        
    

        
        Hobark International Limited (HIL) is the parent company of the Hobark group operating in the oil and gas industry. The company was incorporated in 1998, starting as a staffing agency based in Port Harcourt. Currently we have offices in 4 countries with our head office in Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cost Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking an exprienced Cost Engineer to support our client's upstream oil and gas operations and capital projects.
	The role will be respopsible for cost estimation, budgeting, cost control, and financial reporting across exploration, drilling, production, and facilities projects.
	The successful candidate will work closely with project, engineering, procurement, & field teams to ensure cost efficiency and financial discipline.


Qualification and Experience


	Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Quantity Surveying, Finance, or a related discipline.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Cost Engineer within the upstream oil and gas sector.
	Strong experience in drilling, well operations, field development, and production facilities projects.
	Proficiency in cost control and planning tools such as Primavera P6, SAP, and Microsoft Excel.
	Solid understanding of EPC/EPCM contracting strategies and cost control practices.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified cadidates should send their CV to: Obeten_mbang@hobakintl.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Financial Operations:

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Human Resource Analytics and Artificial Intelligence Officer",
  "description": "Wale University is an Open and Distance Learning institution committed to transforming education across Africa through innovation, real-world learning, and Christ-centered leadership. Our programs are designed to equip students with practical skills, entrepreneurial thinking, and globally relevant competencies to solve problems and create value.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Analytics and Artificial Intelligence Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos (Remote)

&nbsp;Key Responsibilities


	Design and develop structured AI course curricula (live and pre-recorded)
	Deliver engaging live teaching sessions, tutorials, and discussions
	Create high-quality instructional materials, assignments, and assessments
	Translate complex AI concepts into clear, practical, learner-friendly content
	Support learners through mentorship, feedback, and academic guidance
	Collaborate with Wale University&rsquo;s academic and program teams to ensure quality and relevance


Required Qualifications &amp; Skills


	Demonstrated expertise in at least one listed AI domain with practical or research-based experience
	Academic or professional background in AI, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, Law, Business, or related fields
	Prior experience in teaching, training, tutoring, curriculum development, or technical knowledge transfer
	Strong ability to simplify and explain complex AI concepts
	Familiarity with modern AI tools, platforms, and workflows relevant to the specialization

Experienced Hotel Housekeeper Job at Hotel Capitol




        
    

        
        Hotel Capitol is a modern and contemporary hotel that offers not only luxury but comfort at its best. The three-star hotel is strategically located at the heart of Omole Phase 1, making it easily accessible with excellent road networks to other parts of the mainland and the city of Lagos as a whole. The 32-room Hotel offers tastefully furnished deluxe executive and super executive rooms as well as one- and two-bedroom luxury suite.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Experienced Hotel Housekeeper

Job Location: Berger, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for hardworking Housekeepers who can attend to our facility with attention to detail and integrity.
	The goal is to create a clean and orderly environment for our guests that will become a critical factor in maintaining and strengthening our reputation.


Essential Duties and Responsibilities


	Perform a variety of cleaning activities such as sweeping, mopping, dusting, and polishing.
	Ensure all rooms are cared for and inspected according to standards.
	Protect equipment and make sure there are no inadequacies.
	Notify superiors of any damages, deficits, and disturbances.
	Deal with reasonable complaints/requests with professionalism and patience.
	Check stocking levels of all consumables and replace them as required.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an SSCE / GCE / NECO qualification.
	Candidates should reside within Ojodu, Ogba, Agege, Iyana Ipaja and Ikeja axis.


Salary
N60,000 - N70,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@hotelcapitol.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email
